value:
Wow, it looks like there are a lot of
expert archers here. I'd like to learn a
thing or two from them if I can...

Ugh, it's people like Father Saul that
muddy Saint Elimine's good name!$k$pImagine, pretending to deliver holy
teachings while just chatting up every
girl you see...

I want to heal the injured, just like
Father Saul and Bishop Yoder. I pray
to the holy one about it every day.

How to approach them... "Hey, that's
a nice bow, can I touch it?" Argh, no,
no, that's all wrong...$k$pCome on, Dorothy, you need to be
more natural...

"Come, one and all! Pledge yourself
to Saint Elimine and all of your
problems will instantly be solved!"$k$pGood grief, Father Saul, again with
these fliers?

Wow, what a beautiful castle! Here, I
have a delivery for you from your
friend $Nf.

Oh, yes! That's good, right?
I think that went really well!

I'm so sorry, but please move out of
the way! I need to track down Father
Saul before he gets into trouble!

I tend to get scared when I go into an
actual battle... My nerves make it so I
can't move my body like I want to...

I'm not so sure I deserve this, but...
I-I'll try my best!

My name is Dorothy. I'm Father
Saul's bodyguard... Oh, where did
he run off to now?

OK, Dorothy, time to get some good
training in so you're not a burden on
the other Heroes... Ah!$k$pWatch out!$k$pI-I'm so sorry! I tried to aim for the
target, but the arrow flew over this
way instead, a-andâ€”$k$pOh gosh, get it together, Dorothy!
You're not hurt, are you? I am so
terribly sorry!$k$pA-are you sure you're all right?
Whew...that's good. You're such a
kind person, Summoner.$k$pYou've got these incredible powers,
but you're still so humble...$k$pFather Saul could learn a thing or
two from you!
This is going to hurt!
Faith, guide my arrow!
Trying not to panic!
I think I can do this!
Saint Elimine...
My name is Dorothy. I'm Father Saul's bodyguard.
Aah! Please don't do that again. Oh, my poor nerves...
There are so many archers here... I hope I can learn from them.
Have you seen Lady Clarine? Oh... Just Clarine, since we're friends. *giggle*
I can't find Father Saul anywhere... Oh no, what is he up to this time?
I wish I could do more to help people. I'd love to heal the sick and injured with holy power...
I want to be of use to you. If you need anything at all, please let me know.
You got it!
Uh-huh...
I'll give it a shot.
